723050.name: Neon Rage
723050.description:
Fight. Collect. Survive. This is NEON RAGE.

Your ship has crashed on the distant planet NEON due to an unidentified anomaly in space. As your ship broke into pieces during the descend, you have to gather your courage and face the unknown to reclaim broken parts and fix your ship. The unique fluorescent biome isn’t just beautiful, but also deadly.

SURVIVE THE JOURNEY: Neon Rage offers a challenging campaign that will take you on an adventure across the entire island, where you have crashed. Gather parts of your broken ship and survive the dangers lurking in the shadows. Can you get back alive?



BECOME A LEGEND: Wherever you compete with your friends locally during a party or you challenge the global community, your score is always recorded on a global leaderboard for all to see! Raise to fame and demonstrate your survival skills in campaign missions or survival waves!



MASTER THE COMBAT: The gameplay mechanics are easy to learn and combat is intuitive. Anyone can enjoy the brutal world of NEON and hone their skills as they play. You have three tools at your disposal that transform as you pick up energy drops form slain creatures – a sword, a shield and a pistol. How you dual-wield them is up to you and your tactic. No RNG, just you and your skill.

The night is long, cold and dangerous. But one thing is certain though. The night is never dark. The planet isn't suited for those faint of heart. Danger lurks everywhere and the ecosystem has been a fertile breeding ground for vicious animal forms. Grab your weapons and survive the night!

Main Features

  • Intense Combat
  • Unique Creatures
  • Campaign Adventure
  • Survival Challenges
  • Transforming Weapons
  • Immersive VR experience of the alien world Neon
